DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample blood tumor tissue patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn change occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This research trial study gene sample young patient adrenocortical tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Studying Genes Samples From Younger Patients With Adrenocortical Tumor
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To perform whole-genome sequencing , deep sequencing , micro RNA analysis , methylation status , copy number variation analysis , single-nucleotide polymorphism ( SNPs ) analysis pediatric adrenocortical tumor compare result patient 's normal cell . OUTLINE : Archived tumor blood sample analyze whole-genome sequencing , deep sequencing , micro RNA , methylation status , copy variation , single-nucleotide polymorphism . Results compare patient ' normal cell .
